backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor that includes blob storage mixin and defines a convertWordToPdf function stub that currently does nothing.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four features related to Word-to-PDF conversion: rebuilding conversion logic, ensuring proper downloads, adding error handling, and implementing retry functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, utilities, and configuration files for the QuickPDF India application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components using OKLCH color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags for SEO, viewport configuration, and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component that configures TanStack Router with routes for all tool pages, blog pages, and the home page.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdSlot.tsx: Reusable ad placeholder component supporting four variants (header-banner, sidebar, in-content, pre-download) with dashed border styling.
frontend/src/components/blog/blogPosts.t: Blog post registry exporting an array of blog post metadata including slug, title, excerpt, route, and date for two articles.
frontend/src/components/faq/ToolFaq.tsx: Reusable FAQ component that renders an accordion of questions and answers for tool-specific pages.
frontend/src/components/home/BlogPreview: Home page section displaying the two latest blog posts in cards with links to read more and view all posts.
frontend/src/components/home/Hero.tsx: Hero section with headline, description, CTA button to start processing, and trust indicators for security and privacy.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeFaq.tsx: Home page FAQ section with accordion displaying five common questions about the service including pricing, accounts, security, limits, and mobile support.
frontend/src/components/home/toolsCatalo: Defines the TOOLS_CATALOG array containing metadata for all available tools (merge, split, compress PDF, image conversion, etc.) with their routes, icons, and categories.
frontend/src/components/home/ToolsGrid.t: Responsive grid component displaying all available tools from TOOLS_CATALOG with icons, descriptions, and start buttons.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with tool links organized by category, trust indicators, URL copy functionality, and copyright information.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navbar.ts: Provides the fixed top navigation bar with logo, navigation links, and a responsive mobile menu with hamburger toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Main layout wrapper that combines Navbar, Footer, ad slots, and a sidebar, rendering child routes via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/seo/RelatedTools: Displays a card with links to related tools based on provided tool IDs, filtering out the current tool.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: SEO component that applies meta tags for title and description using the useSeoMeta hook.
frontend/src/components/tools/image/Imag: Provides UI controls for image resizing with three modes (pixels, percentage, target-size), aspect ratio maintenance, quality selection, and input validation.
frontend/src/components/tools/pdf/ImageT: Configuration UI for converting images to PDF, allowing selection of page size, image fit mode, and margin settings.
frontend/src/components/tools/pdf/Remove: Input form for specifying which PDF pages to remove using comma-separated numbers and hyphenated ranges.
frontend/src/components/tools/pdf/Resize: Dropdown selector for choosing target PDF page size from standard formats (A4, Letter, Legal, A3, A5).
frontend/src/components/tools/pdf/Waterm: Configuration UI for PDF watermarks with controls for text, opacity, font size, rotation, position, and font style.
Canvas-based preview component that renders a watermark on a simulated PDF page using the provided configuration.
frontend/src/components/tools/processors: Barrel export file that re-exports PDF-to-Word and Word-to-PDF processors with their types.

Converts PDF files to Word documents (DOCX) by loading pdf-lib and docx libraries from CDN, extracting placeholder text per page (actual text extraction not implemented), and generating a DOCX blob with page breaks.
Converts Word documents (.doc/.docx) to PDF using a backend API, with file validation (type, size up to 10MB), progress reporting, and error handling.
Resizes images using canvas API with three modes (pixels, percentage, target-size), supports aspect ratio maintenance, quality settings, and includes comprehensive validation and progress reporting.
Adds text watermarks to PDF pages using pdf-lib with configurable opacity, font size, rotation, position (center/corners), and font style (Helvetica/Times/Courier).
Compresses PDF files using pdf-lib by loading and re-saving with object streams optimization, though compression capabilities are limited by the library.
Converts multiple images (JPG/PNG) to a single PDF using pdf-lib with configurable page size (A4/Letter), fit modes (fit/fill/original), and margins.
Barrel export file that re-exports all PDF processor functions and types from the pdf directory.
Merges multiple PDF files into a single document using pdf-lib by copying all pages from each input file sequentially.
Defines standard page size constants (A4, Letter, Legal, A3, A5) in points with a helper function to retrieve dimensions.
Deprecated legacy module for backend PDF processing; all functions now throw errors directing users to client-side processing with pdf-lib instead.

Provides shared PDF processing utilities that dynamically load pdf-lib from CDN, including functions for loading the library, getting page counts, validating file sizes, reading files as ArrayBuffer, and updating progress callbacks.

Implements PDF page removal functionality with page range parsing support (e.g., "1-3,5"), validates page numbers, and creates a new PDF document excluding specified pages while enforcing a 10MB file size limit.
Resizes PDF pages to standard sizes (A4, Letter, Legal, A3, A5) by creating a new PDF document with target dimensions and embedding scaled/centered original pages while maintaining aspect ratio.
Splits a multi-page PDF into individual single-page PDFs, packages them into a ZIP file using dynamically loaded JSZip library, and enforces a 20MB file size limit.
frontend/src/components/tools/SelectedFi: Displays a list of selected files with file type, size, and optional remove buttons for each file.
Defines structured error handling for tool processing failures with normalization functions and user-friendly error messages tailored to specific tool types and error conditions.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolExperi: Main tool workflow component managing upload, processing states, progress display, error handling, result download, and step indicators with auto-scroll to options.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolNextSt: Shows an animated alert with sparkles and arrow icon to guide users to the next step in the tool workflow.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolPageSh: Layout wrapper for tool pages providing consistent title, description, and content container styling.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolPrimar: Styled primary action button with green theme, loading state, and optional icon for main tool actions.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolResult: Success screen component displaying a checkmark, success message, and download button for processed files.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolSecond: Styled secondary action button with outline or ghost variants for less prominent tool actions.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolStepIn: Visual progress indicator showing three steps (Upload, Settings, Download) with checkmarks for completed steps.
frontend/src/components/tools/UploadDrop: A drag-and-drop file upload component with validation for file types, sizes, and counts, displaying selected files or a dropzone UI with error handling.
frontend/src/components/trust/TrustNotes: Displays a trust banner component with three key features: secure/private file handling, no login requirement, and fast client-side processing, using icons and descriptive text.
frontend/src/config/toolLimits.ts: Defines file size limits for different tool types (default 20MB, images 5MB, conversions 10MB) and provides standardized error messages for limit violations and file validation failures.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, caching the actor instance and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollToTop.ts: Custom React hook that scrolls the window to the top on component mount, using instant scroll on mobile devices and smooth scroll on desktop.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeoMeta.ts: Custom React hook that dynamically updates the document title and meta description for SEO purposes.
frontend/src/hooks/useToolJob.ts: Custom React hook managing tool job state (idle, uploading, processing, done, error) with progress tracking, error handling, and result file management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with green-themed OKLCH color system for light/dark modes, custom prose styles for blog content, and tool section utilities.
frontend/src/lib/base64.ts: Utility functions for converting between File, base64 strings, Uint8Array, and Blob formats for binary data handling.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Utility function to trigger file downloads in the browser with mobile-friendly handling, including DOM manipulation and delayed cleanup.
frontend/src/lib/fileFormat.ts: Utility functions to format file sizes in human-readable format and get user-friendly file type labels from MIME types or extensions.
frontend/src/lib/wordToPdfApi.ts: API wrapper for converting Word documents to PDF using backend actor, with progress tracking and comprehensive error handling for various backend failure scenarios.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient provider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogIndexPage.ts: Blog index page displaying a list of all blog posts with titles, excerpts, dates, and links to individual articles with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/blog/HowToCompressPdf: Blog article page explaining how to compress PDF files online, covering benefits, step-by-step instructions, compression techniques, privacy features, and tips for best results with links to related tools.
frontend/src/pages/blog/ResizeImageUnder: Blog article page providing a guide for resizing images to meet 50KB file size requirements, including use cases (job applications, government forms), step-by-step instructions, and optimization tips.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component rendering Hero, ToolsGrid, HomeFaq, and BlogPreview sections with SEO metadata for the main landing page.
frontend/src/pages/tools/AddWatermarkPag: Tool page for adding customizable text watermarks to PDF files with options for opacity, font size, rotation, position, and font style, featuring live preview and client-side processing.
frontend/src/pages/tools/CompressPdfPage: Tool page for compressing PDF files to reduce file size while maintaining quality, using client-side processing with FAQ section and related tool links.
Tool page for converting multiple images (JPG, PNG) into a single PDF document with configurable page size, fit mode, and margin options, supporting up to 20 images.
frontend/src/pages/tools/MergePdfPage.ts: Tool page for combining multiple PDF files into a single document while preserving page order, supporting up to 10 files with client-side processing.
frontend/src/pages/tools/PdfToWordPage.t: Page component for converting PDF files to Word (.docx) format with text extraction, file upload, progress tracking, and FAQ section.
frontend/src/pages/tools/RemovePagesPage: Page component for removing specified pages from PDFs using page ranges or individual page numbers, with validation and preview of page count.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ResizeImagePage: Page component for resizing images (JPEG, PNG, WEBP) with preview, dimension display, file validation (5MB limit), and before/after comparison.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ResizePdfPage.t: Page component for resizing PDF pages to standard sizes (A4, Letter, Legal, A3, A5) with proportional content scaling and browser-based processing.
frontend/src/pages/tools/SplitPdfPage.ts: Page component for splitting PDF into individual page files packaged as a ZIP archive, with client-side processing and FAQ section.
frontend/src/pages/tools/word-to-pdf/INT: Integration documentation describing the rebuilt Word-to-PDF module structure, modified files, new components, API integration, and backend method signatures.
frontend/src/pages/tools/word-to-pdf/Wor: Error card component that displays conversion failure messages with conditional retry and start-over buttons based on error type (retryable vs non-retryable errors like invalid files).
frontend/src/pages/tools/word-to-pdf/wor: FAQ data array containing six common questions and answers about Word-to-PDF conversion including supported formats, file size limits, security, and formatting preservation.
frontend/src/pages/tools/word-to-pdf/Wor: Progress card component showing animated loader and progress bar for uploading and converting states with file name and percentage display.
Success card component displaying conversion completion with download button and option to process another file, using downloadBlob utility for file download.
Theme configuration object defining green/white color scheme (#22c55e primary) and styling constants for the Word-to-PDF tool UI.
Main orchestrator component managing the complete Word-to-PDF conversion flow with state machine (idle/uploading/converting/success/error) and file handling logic.
Upload interface component with drag-and-drop support, file input, and file preview showing selected document details with convert/remove actions.
frontend/src/pages/tools/word-to-pdf/wor: File validation utility function checking Word document type (.doc/.docx), size limits (10MB max), and returning structured validation results with error messages.
frontend/src/pages/tools/WordToPdfPage.t: Page component for converting Word documents (.doc, .docx) to PDF format, delegating to WordToPdfTool component with SEO, ads, and related tools.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state file for a document conversion tool that converts Word (.doc/.docx) to PDF with formatting preservation, error handling, retry functionality, and file download capabilities. Tracks four existing features related to conversion logic, download mechanism, error handling, and retry button implementation.
